that he's done for me, for the government and for the country,'' David Cameron said. Opposition leader Ed Miliband said his Labour Party had been proved right to question Andy Coulson 's position. Labour has been saying for some months that there are real questions about Andy Coulson 's ability to do his job given the cloud of allegations hanging over him, Ed Miliband said. The government is pushing through harsh spending cuts to tackle a record budget deficit.
